properties.sql-pre-query:
CREATE TABLE #{schema}.columns_with_rules AS
SELECT column_name, table_name, 'not_null_check' AS validation_rule, '' AS condition, 'Completeness' AS validation_grp
FROM #{schema}.parsed_fields
WHERE nullable = false

UNION ALL

SELECT column_name, table_name, 'data_type_check' AS validation_rule, data_type AS condition, 'Validity' AS validation_grp
FROM #{schema}.parsed_fields
WHERE data_type IS NOT NULL

UNION ALL

SELECT column_name, table_name, 'valid_value_check' AS validation_rule, valid_values AS condition, 'Validity' AS validation_grp
FROM #{schema}.parsed_fields
WHERE valid_values IS NOT NULL AND valid_values != 'NoValue'

UNION ALL

SELECT column_name, table_name, 'default_value_check' AS validation_rule, default_value AS condition, 'Validity' AS validation_grp
FROM #{schema}.parsed_fields
WHERE default_value IS NOT NULL AND default_value != 'NoDefaultValue'

UNION ALL

SELECT column_name, table_name, 'pattern_check' AS validation_rule, valid_pattern AS condition, 'Validity' AS validation_grp
FROM #{schema}.parsed_fields
WHERE valid_pattern <> 'NoPattern';

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS #{schema}.glue_tbls_with_total_col;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS #{schema}.parsed_fields;

properties.AddCntOfRuleEachColumn:
SELECT *,
	(
        CASE WHEN data_type IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END +
        CASE WHEN nullable = false THEN 1 ELSE 0 END +
        CASE WHEN default_value <> 'NoDefaultValue' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END +
        CASE WHEN valid_values IS NOT NULL AND valid_values <> 'NoValue' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END +
		CASE WHEN valid_pattern IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
    ) AS rules_per_col
FROM flowfile

properties.sql-pre-query:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS #{schema}.dqr_tbl_with_pk_tbl_rec;
CREATE TABLE #{schema}.dqr_tbl_with_pk_tbl_rec AS
WITH table_with_pk_column AS (
    SELECT 
        a.rule_id,
        a.rule_name,
        a.connection_id,
        a.table_name,
        a.validation_type,
        a.validation_grp,
        a.column_name,
        a.validation_rule,
        a.condition,
        a.column_description,
        a.rule_description,
        b.column_name AS pk_column
    FROM dq_checks.dq_rules a
    LEFT JOIN (
        SELECT table_name, column_name 
        FROM dq_checks.dq_rules 
        WHERE validation_rule = 'primary_key_check'
    ) b
    ON a.table_name = b.table_name
)
SELECT a.*, b.row_count AS total_record_in_table
FROM table_with_pk_column a
LEFT JOIN #{schema}.table_with_total_count b
  ON a.table_name = b.table_name;

properties.SQL Query:
SELECT '${table_name}' AS table_name,
	   	${total_record_in_table} as total_record_in_table,
	   	'${validation}' as validation_grp,
       	COUNT(*) AS pass_cnt_for_completeness
FROM #{source_schema}.${table_name}
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT DISTINCT concatenated_pk_columns 
    FROM #{schema}.merged_result_tbl 
    WHERE table_name = '${table_name}' 
      AND validation_grp = '${validation}'
) AS selected_pk
ON concat_ws('_', ${pk_column}) = selected_pk.concatenated_pk_columns
WHERE selected_pk.concatenated_pk_columns IS NULL;

SELECT '${table_name}' AS table_name,
	   	${total_record_in_table} as total_record_in_table,
	   	'${validation}' as validation_grp,
       	COUNT(*) AS pass_cnt_for_completeness
FROM #{source_schema}.${table_name}
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT DISTINCT concatenated_pk_columns 
    FROM #{schema}.merged_result_tbl 
    WHERE table_name = '${table_name}' 
      AND validation_grp = '${validation}'
) AS selected_pk
ON concat_ws('_', ${pk_column}) = selected_pk.concatenated_pk_columns
WHERE selected_pk.concatenated_pk_columns IS NULL;

SELECT '${table_name}' AS table_name,
	   	${total_record_in_table} as total_record_in_table,
	   	'${validation}' as validation_grp,
       	COUNT(*) AS pass_cnt_for_completeness
FROM #{source_schema}.${table_name}
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT DISTINCT concatenated_pk_columns 
    FROM #{schema}.merged_result_tbl 
    WHERE table_name = '${table_name}' 
      AND validation_grp = '${validation}'
) AS selected_pk
ON concat_ws('_', ${pk_column}) = selected_pk.concatenated_pk_columns
WHERE selected_pk.concatenated_pk_columns IS NULL;

SELECT '${table_name}' AS table_name,
	   	${total_record_in_table} as total_record_in_table,
	   	'${validation}' as validation_grp,
       	COUNT(*) AS pass_cnt_for_completeness
FROM #{source_schema}.${table_name}
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT DISTINCT concatenated_pk_columns 
    FROM #{schema}.merged_result_tbl 
    WHERE table_name = '${table_name}' 
      AND validation_grp = '${validation}'
) AS selected_pk
ON concat_ws('_', ${pk_column}) = selected_pk.concatenated_pk_columns
WHERE selected_pk.concatenated_pk_columns IS NULL;

SELECT '${table_name}' AS table_name,
	   	${total_record_in_table} as total_record_in_table,
	   	'${validation}' as validation_grp,
       	COUNT(*) AS pass_cnt_for_completeness
FROM #{source_schema}.${table_name}
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT DISTINCT concatenated_pk_columns 
    FROM #{schema}.merged_result_tbl 
    WHERE table_name = '${table_name}' 
      AND validation_grp = '${validation}'
) AS selected_pk
ON concat_ws('_', ${pk_column}) = selected_pk.concatenated_pk_columns
WHERE selected_pk.concatenated_pk_columns IS NULL;

select count(*) table_remaining
from (select table_name, count(distinct validation_grp) cnt 
from #{schema}.pass_rec_per_table group by table_name) as tbl_grouped
where cnt < (select count(distinct validation_grp) from #{schema}.merged_result_tbl);

WITH grped_by_validation AS (
    SELECT 
        validation_grp,
        SUM(total_record_in_table - pass_cnt_for_completeness) AS final_fail_count
    FROM #{schema}.pass_rec_per_table
    GROUP BY validation_grp
)
SELECT 
    '${today}' as run_date,
    '${run_id}' as run_id,
    validation_grp as validation_group,
    final_fail_count as fail_record_count,
	(select sum(row_count) from #{schema}.table_with_total_count) as total_record_count
FROM grped_by_validation

properties.selecting_columns: select DISTINCT run_date,run_id,table_name,total_record_fail_in_table as fail_record_count,total_record_in_table as total_record_count from flowfile

properties.sql-pre-query:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS #{schema}.agg_record_tbl;

CREATE TABLE #{schema}.agg_record_tbl AS
with agg_records as(select 
	a.*,
	b.final_failed_record_count as total_record_fail_in_table,
	c.fail_record_count as total_record_fail_in_validation_type,
	count(case when concatenated_pk_columns != 'no_column' then concatenated_pk_columns else null end)
	over(partition by rule_id) as total_record_fail_in_rule_id,
	row_number() over(partition by rule_id) as rnk
	from #{schema}.merged_result_tbl a 
	left join #{schema}.fail_record_grouped_by_table b
		on a.table_name = b.table_name
	left join #{schema}.dqsummary c
		on a.validation_grp = c.validation_group
		and c.run_id = a.run_id)
select *,
	(select sum(total_record_fail_in_table) from (select distinct(table_name) table_name, 
	total_record_fail_in_table from agg_records) AS distinct_tbl_fail) AS total_record_fail_for_run_id,
	(select sum(total_record_in_table) from (select distinct(table_name) table_name, 
	total_record_in_table from agg_records) AS distinct_validation_grp_fail) AS total_record_for_run_id
from agg_records where rnk =1;

properties.sql-pre-query:
-- Step 1: Create the enriched base table excluding 'no_column' and tagging PK failures
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS #{schema}.merge_tbl_with_filtered_column;

CREATE TABLE #{schema}.merge_tbl_with_filtered_column AS
SELECT 
    m.table_name,
    m.concatenated_pk_columns,
    m.rule_id,
    m.validation_grp,
    m.validation_rule,
    CASE 
        WHEN pk_chk.concatenated_pk_columns IS NOT NULL THEN pk_chk.concatenated_pk_columns
        ELSE NULL
    END AS pk_available_in_fail_pk
FROM #{schema}.merged_result_tbl m
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT DISTINCT table_name, concatenated_pk_columns
    FROM #{schema}.merged_result_tbl
    WHERE validation_rule = 'primary_key_check'
) pk_chk
ON m.table_name = pk_chk.table_name
AND m.concatenated_pk_columns = pk_chk.concatenated_pk_columns
AND m.validation_rule != 'primary_key_check'
WHERE m.concatenated_pk_columns != 'no_column';

-- step 2-- Table-level grouping
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS #{schema}.fail_record_grouped_by_table;
CREATE TABLE #{schema}.fail_record_grouped_by_table AS
SELECT 
    table_name, 
    COUNT(*) AS final_failed_record_count 
FROM (
    SELECT DISTINCT table_name, concatenated_pk_columns 
    FROM #{schema}.merge_tbl_with_filtered_column 
    WHERE pk_available_in_fail_pk IS NULL 
      AND validation_rule != 'primary_key_check'
    
    UNION ALL

    SELECT table_name, concatenated_pk_columns 
    FROM #{schema}.merge_tbl_with_filtered_column
    WHERE validation_rule = 'primary_key_check'
) AS uni
GROUP BY table_name;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS #{schema}.merge_tbl_with_filtered_column;

properties.SQL Query: select table_name from information_schema.tables where table_schema = '#{schema}';
properties.sql-pre-query:
CREATE SCHEMA IF NOT EXISTS #{schema};
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS #{schema}.dq_rules;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS #{schema}.table_with_total_count;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS #{schema}.merged_result_tbl;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS #{schema}.pass_rec_per_table;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS #{schema}.dq_rules (
    rule_id BIGINT,
    rule_name VARCHAR(200),
    connection_id INT,
    table_name VARCHAR(50),
    validation_type VARCHAR(50),    
    validation_grp VARCHAR(50),
    column_name VARCHAR(50),
    validation_rule VARCHAR(50),
    condition VARCHAR(100),
    column_description VARCHAR(200),
    rule_description VARCHAR(200)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS #{schema}.table_with_total_count (
    table_name VARCHAR(50),
    row_count INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS #{schema}.merged_result_tbl (
    run_date DATE,
    table_name VARCHAR(50),
    concatenated_pk_columns VARCHAR(200),
    rule_id VARCHAR(50),
    rule_name VARCHAR(200),
    validation_grp VARCHAR(50),
    validation_type VARCHAR(50),
    total_record_in_table INTEGER,
    run_id BIGINT,
    total_rules INTEGER,
    query_generation_status VARCHAR(100),
	validation_rule VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS #{schema}.dqstat(run_date varchar(20),
	run_id BIGINT,
	table_name varchar(20),
	rule_id integer,
	fail_record_count integer, 
	total_record_count bigint);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS #{schema}.dqsummary(
	run_date varchar(20),
	run_id BIGINT,
	validation_group varchar(20),
	fail_record_count integer, 
	total_record_count bigint);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS #{schema}.dqscore(
	run_date varchar(20),
	run_id BIGINT,
	table_name varchar(20),
	fail_record_count integer, 
	total_record_count bigint);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS #{schema}.pass_rec_per_table(
	table_name varchar(50),
	total_record_in_table integer,
	validation_grp varchar(50),
	pass_cnt_for_completeness integer
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS #{schema}.dq_check_logs(
	run_date varchar(20),
	run_id BIGINT,
	log_time varchar(20),
	message varchar(200)
);
